page.title: 09HOUSING IN PATCHWAY N.E.
page.content: A lot of the houses are about 20 years old but those on the common and in Hempton Lane are much older. The average house today has a lounge, kitchen,dining room and 3-4 bedrooms and costs about Â£28,000. In Cranham Drive and Standish Ave. there are 7{police houses.}2 police houses in Southsea Rd. have been sold. We have some residential{caravans on the old Little Stoke Farm in Clay Lane. They have been there for 25 yrs. and have a club attached. Also on this farm's land,in Tetbury Close,there are 3 blocks of flats and one{O.A.P.home with a night and day warden.There are 14 bungalows and 40 houses. There are also 4{bungalows for handicapped {people.}There are still some apple trees left from the farm orchard,but they are crab apples.
